channel.title: [VB] iTunesArtFetcher
channel.description:
Working on a new program to fetch iTunes Art and needs testers
so far all it does is: 1. connect to itunes 2. get all your songs 3. get albums by artist and album name (only thing that is supported atm) Gets the first result off of amazon.com and uses that 4. downloads to computer
I will remove the downloading part and just save to a temp file and put right into itunes eventually
So i need testers to test what I got so far because I want to remove the bugs I have so far before messing with the COM again. Also need to speed it up :-D
[img]http://zellington.powweb.com/hosted/train/artfetcher.PNG[/img]
URL: http://zellington.powweb.com/hosted/train/iTunesArtFetcher.zip

and ill reupload as a zip…

item.title: [VB] iTunesArtFetcher
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

program updated:
http://zellington.powweb.com/hosted/train/iTunesArtFetcher.zip

New:
Actually adds the artwork into iTunes!!!
If no album set, it uses song name (Not tested)
Will not get the song if it already has artwork in itunes

Changes:
Smaller size exe and no debug database
Fixed bug with sorting while its getting art (YOU CANT MWHAHAHAH!)

@llib:
not sure if this version will fix your bug or not…it should though

Read full topic

item.title: [VB] iTunesArtFetcher

[/quote]
Ok thx. I’ll finish my updated version tomarrow and see if that fixes.

edit:
This interests me greatly: C:\Documents and Settings\Austin\My Documents\Visual Studio 2005\Projects\iTunesArtFetcher\iTunesArtFetcher\Form1.vb:line 43

thats the location of my vb folder for it, wonder why its in your error msg.[/quote]

Idk…Maybe more info is stored in the .exe then they let on to…?

Another Microsoft scandal obviously. lol

item.title: [VB] iTunesArtFetcher
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“llib, post:10, topic:139671”]I <3 this idea.

Only I get a problem when I try to gather playlist…

Actually, I get an error message like that when I try to click on any of the buttons…help someone? :P[/quote]
hit details and take a pic of that plz.

make sure u have itunes started, and installed
and whats ur itunes version?

let me know because I am updating now.

Fixed a bug that happened when u sorted while was getting art would result in shit getting completely fucked up.
No longer downloads art if there already is some in iTunes

Read full topic

item.description:

Only I get a problem when I try to gather playlist…

Edit:

[quote=“exps35, post:7, topic:139671”]eh

Mine always asks me for a credit card when I want to register.
And I can’t get album art until I log in with my account, which is non-existent.[/quote]

^
I have that same problem lol…Dam you iTunes…

Working on a new program to fetch iTunes Art and needs testers

so far all it does is:

  1. connect to itunes
  2. get all your songs
  3. get albums by artist and album name (only thing that is supported atm)
    Gets the first result off of amazon.com and uses that
  4. downloads to computer
